TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit HostProtectionAttribute extends System.Security.Permissions.CodeAccessSecurityAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class HostProtectionAttribute Inherits CodeAccessSecurityAttribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Struct | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method | System.AttributeTargets.Delegate, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)

summary.span: 允许使用声明性安全操作来确定宿主保护要求。

span.span: Allows the use of declarative security actions to determine host protection requirements.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性只影响非托管的应用该承载公共语言运行时和实现主机保护，例如 SQL Server。This attribute affects only unmanaged applications that host the common language runtime and implement host protection, such as SQL Server. 如果代码在客户端应用程序中运行或在非主机保护的服务器上运行，此特性则会“蒸发”；由于它不会被检测到，因此不会被应用。If the code is run in a client application or on a server that is not host-protected, the attribute "evaporates"; it is not detected and therefore not applied. 应用后，安全性操作会导致基于类或方法公开的主机资源而创建链接要求。When applied, the security action results in the creation of a link demand based on the host resources the class or method exposes. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此特性的目的在于强制执行特定于主机的编程模型准则，而非安全行为。The purpose of this attribute is to enforce host-specific programming model guidelines, not security behavior. 虽然链接要求是用于检查是否符合编程模型要求，但 不是安全权限。Although a link demand is used to check for conformance to programming model requirements, the is not a security permission. 如果此主机没有编程模型要求，则不会出现链接要求。If the host does not have programming model requirements, the link demands do not occur. 此特性可以标识以下各项：This attribute identifies the following: - 不适合主机编程模型，但属于良性的方法或类。Methods or classes that do not fit the host programming model, but are otherwise benign. - 不适合主机编程模型且可能导致破坏服务器托管的用户代码稳定性的方法或类。Methods or classes that do not fit the host programming model and could lead to destabilizing server-managed user code. - 不适合主机编程模型且可能导致破坏服务器进程自身稳定性的方法或类。Methods or classes that do not fit the host programming model and could lead to a destabilization of the server process itself. > [!NOTE] > 如果要创建由可能在主机保护的环境中执行的应用程序调用的类库，则应该将此特性应用于公开 资源类别的成员。If you are creating a class library that is to be called by applications that may execute in a host protected environment, you should apply this attribute to members that expose resource categories. 具有此特性的 .NET Framework 类库成员会导致仅对直接调用方进行检查。The .NET Framework class library members with this attribute cause only the immediate caller to be checked. 你的库成员也必须使用同一方法对其直接调用方进行检查。Your library member must also cause a check of its immediate caller in the same manner. > [!NOTE] > 不要使用[Ngen.exe （本机映像生成器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ngen-exe-native-image-generator.md)若要创建受保护的程序集的本机映像。Do not use the [Ngen.exe (Native Image Generator)](~/docs/framework/tools/ngen-exe-native-image-generator.md) to create a native image of assemblies that are protected by the . 在完全信任环境中，图像始终处于加载状态，而不考虑到，以及在部分信任环境中不加载映像。In a full-trust environment, the image is always loaded, without regard to the , and in a partial-trust environment the image is not loaded. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用具有各种属性值。The following code example illustrates the use of the attribute with a variety of values. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.1.1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.1.1/CPP/hostprotectionattribute.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.1.1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.1.1/CS/hostprotectionattribute.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.1.1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.1.1/VB/hostprotectionattribute.vb#1)]

Public Overrides Function CreatePermission () As IPermission

summary.span: 创建并返回一个新的宿主保护权限。

span.span: Creates and returns a new host protection permission.
An that corresponds to the current attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 绝不能由应用程序代码，应仅由安全系统中，调用此方法。This method should be called only by the security system, never by application code. 在编译时，属性将安全声明转换为元数据中序列化形式。At compile time, attributes convert security declarations to a serialized form in metadata. 从对应于此方法返回的属性的权限创建元数据中的声明性安全数据。Declarative security data in metadata is created from the permission corresponding to the attribute that this method returns.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExternalProcessMgmt { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否公开外部进程管理。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether external process management is exposed.

value.span: 如果公开外部进程管理，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if external process management is exposed; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公开外部进程管理的代码可以创建或销毁其他进程。Code that exposes external process management might create or destroy other processes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用特性与属性。The following code example illustrates the use of the attribute with the property. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExternalThreading { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否公开外部线程处理。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether external threading is exposed.

value.span: 如果公开外部线程处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if external threading is exposed; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公开外部线程处理的代码会创建或操作而不是其自身，这可能是对宿主有害的线程。Code that exposes external threading creates or manipulates threads other than its own, which might be harmful to the host. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用特性与属性。The following code example illustrates the use of the attribute with the property. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.1.1#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.1.1/CPP/hostprotectionattribute.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.1.1#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.1.1/CS/hostprotectionattribute.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.1.1#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.1.1/VB/hostprotectionattribute.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool MayLeakOnAbort { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当操作被终止时资源是否可能泄漏内存。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether resources might leak memory if the operation is terminated.

value.span: 如果操作终止时资源可能泄漏内存，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if resources might leak memory on termination; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不受安全句柄或某些其他方式来确保资源的释放，则代码可能会导致终止时，资源泄漏。Code might cause a resource leak on termination, if not protected by a safe handle or some other means of ensuring the release of resources.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Permissions::HostProtectionResource Resources { System::Security::Permissions::HostProtectionResource get(); void set(System::Security::Permissions::HostProtectionResource value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置标志，这些标志指定可能对宿主有害的功能类别。

span.span: Gets or sets flags specifying categories of functionality that are potentially harmful to the host.
A bitwise combination of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标志指定可能对宿主有害的资源公开的方法或类。The flags specify the resources exposed by the method or class that are potentially harmful to the host. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用特性与属性。The following code example illustrates the use of the attribute with the property. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否公开安全基础结构。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the security infrastructure is exposed.

value.span: 如果公开安全基础结构，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the security infrastructure is exposed; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用要模拟的用户对象是公开安全基础结构的示例。The use of a object to impersonate a user is an example of exposing the security infrastructure. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用特性与属性。The following code example illustrates the use of the attribute with the property. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否公开自影响的进程管理。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether self-affecting process management is exposed.

value.span: 如果公开自影响的进程管理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if self-affecting process management is exposed; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自影响的进程管理代码可能会退出当前过程，终止服务器。Self-affecting process management code might exit the current process, terminating the server. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用特性与属性。The following code example illustrates the use of the attribute with the property. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SelfAffectingThreading { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否公开自影响的线程处理。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether self-affecting threading is exposed.

value.span: 如果公开自影响的线程处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if self-affecting threading is exposed; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自影响的线程处理操作中只会影响用户代码的方式的线程。Self-affecting threading manipulates threads in a way that only affects user code. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用特性与属性。The following code example illustrates the use of the attribute with the property. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SharedState { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否公开共享状态。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether shared state is exposed.

value.span: 如果公开共享状态，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if shared state is exposed; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当是`true`，它指示是否公开状态，可能会在线程间共享。When is `true`, it indicates that a state is exposed that might be shared between threads. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用特性与属性。The following code example illustrates the use of the attribute with the property. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
